import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Play, BookOpen, BarChart3, Shield, Award, Users, ArrowRight, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: BookOpen, title: 'Comprehensive Training', description: 'Learn from industry experts with our comprehensive training modules covering all aspects of excavator operation.' }, { icon: Play, title: 'Interactive Simulator', description: 'Practice in a realistic 3D environment with our advanced excavator simulator.' }, { icon: BarChart3, title: 'Progress Tracking', description: 'Monitor your learning progress with detailed analytics and performance metrics.' }, { icon: Shield, title: 'Safety First', description: 'Emphasis on safety protocols and best practices for safe excavator operation.' }, { icon: Award, title: 'Certification', description: 'Earn recognized certifications upon completion of training modules.' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Expert Support', description: 'Access to experienced instructors and support team throughout your training.' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '500+', label: 'Trained Operators' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Training Modules' }, { number: '95%', label: 'Success Rate' }, { number: '24/7', label: 'Support Available' } ]; return (

); }; export default Home;
